value:
Is there a church nearby? I wish to
offer up a prayer to the god of Askr,
if I may.$k$pI would pray for the protection of
everyone here. I want you all to
stay safe.

As a priest in Ylisse, I took up the axe
to defend Her Grace, the Exalt. After
that, I joined Prince Chrom's army.

The gift to summon Heroes from
countless realms is a power like
that of the gods.$k$pPlease, use that power to both guide
and protect us.

Did you say "cleric"? O great ones...
what am I to do? Even the summoner
mistakes me for a woman!

I was inspired to draw a landscape
just moments ago... This land has a
beautiful, even holy, quality about it...$k$pI simply thought it befitting to capture
it on canvas.

I come bearing good tidings for you.
May the gods protect you, always.

I feel cleansed. Perhaps this is
in answer to my prayers.
Many thanks, O great ones.

O great ones, why do you see
fit to test me this way...

I am filled with a light, warm and
pure. I thank the gods and you.

I'm Libra, a priest from the Halidom
of Ylisse. The gods have guided me
here. May Naga bless us all.

Oh, dear. It seems that you have
discovered me. I was attempting to
paint a portrait of you just now.$k$pI don't do this all that often, but
observing you moved me...$k$pYou're a captivating person—how you
move, how you summon, and even
your demeanor when we talk.$k$pBefore I knew it, I had brush in hand.
Perhaps the fact that you summoned
me draws me to you...$k$pI'd like to believe that my affection
for you is my own, though.$k$pI am thankful that I had this chance to
share my feelings with you today.$k$pThat said, do you mind if I continue
to paint? I'd love to have you all to
myself, even for only a short time.
はいっ！
せやっ！
うあっ！
そんな…！
Gods forgive me!
Repent, sinner!
Offer your prayers!
In Naga's name.
I can see the light...
Yes
You continue to fare well. I am glad of this.
My appearance may not suggest it, but I'm quite capable of manual labor.
Do my prayers to Naga reach her, even from this world?
You wish to speak to me? Perhaps you wish to make confession.
On my journey to the priesthood, I faced many hardships.
A priest who takes a life...is indeed quite a sinner.
Praying for safety on the battlefield is nothing more than a wish that another may be sacrificed. Even so...
It will be so.
Gods bless us.
Guide us.
